pkmkdoc.description:
Summary of some of the enhancements for Release version 1.7.2
1. Added Predator video support
2. We have a richer routable message for implementation of a decoupled API.
3. Started a general API interface for easier coding to the planet internals.
4. Add Operation queues for better multi thread management in the planet core.
5. Added callbacks to property updates and node adds in the planet core so asynchronous updates could happen in a interactive environment.
6. Added a general annotation layer that others can use. Supports Text in this release.
